listitem.para: GLMMHDUpdate_euler - Euler scheme for the magneto-hydrodynamics equations with hyperbolic divergence cleaning.
GLMMHDUpdate_hancock - MUSCL-Hancock scheme for the magneto-hydrodynamics equations with hyperbolic divergence cleaning.
GLMMHDUpdate_RK2 - SSP-RK2 scheme for the magneto-hydrodynamics equations with hyperbolic divergence cleaning.
HydroUpdate_euler - Euler (1st order) scheme for the hydrodynamics equations.
HydroUpdate_euler_no-patch - Euler (1st order) scheme for the hydrodynamics equations, without hierarchical parallelism.
HydroUpdate_hancock - MUSCL-Hancock scheme for the hydrodynamics equations.
HydroUpdate_RK2 - SSP-RK2 scheme for the hydrodynamics equations.
